paper.title: Based on Multi - objective Fuzzy Decision model to study Tech Micro Enterprise Financing Credit Risk Evaluation System
paper.abstract: This paper based on fuzzy clustering model to rank scores is used to evaluate high-tech small and micro enterprises financing credit risk. According to the index weight of the resulting weight value, analyzing the impact results. Determine level indicators include high-tech small and micro enterprise financing characteristics, operational risk, credit risk, financial services risk, legal and reputation risk, and refined based on level indicators of secondary indicators, finally get fuzzy evaluation results: Z= (0.31 0.25 0.19 0.16 0.09)

domain_result.justification: 该论文基于模糊聚类模型对高科技小微企业的融资信用风险进行评估，并分析了不同风险指标的影响，这直接涉及信用风险管理的范畴，属于金融风险管理领域。
